project.Title: Templar Arbalest class mod
project.ItemDescription:
New class mod: Templar Arbalest.
Attracted by strange rumours, the Temple sent one of its followers to investigate the situation.
Templar arbalest destroys enemies at a distance thanks to his crossbow. If necessary, he can take close combat, relying on his silver-plated armor.
Skills: Deadly shot - powerful shot with a silver bolt. Additional damage to undead and a high chance of critical strike. Bodkin bolt - armour-piercing shot. Quicksilver - a special mixture of the Temple. For the undead, with love. Radiance - attracting the attention of the enemy. However, the hero is ready for this (activating riposte + prot buff). Holy light - crystal vessel with a glowing liquid. There is engraving: "Phial of Galadriel". Close combat - hit in the stomach and retreat back. How noble! Blinding shot - a dazzling volley into the sky. Why the allies do not become blind - a big secret.
Trinkets: Toxic silver: +20% bligh chance. Persecutor ring: +3 SPD/-3 DODGE Code of the Temple: +20% DMG/-15% stress damage/ -10% PROT Templar goblet: +35 virtue/-15% stress/-10% DMG Permission for eliminating: +25% DMG/+ 7 ACC/+ 5 CRT/ +15 stress damage/ -30 healing receive
